name: Pho Tran Vietnamese Restaurant
address: Pho Tran Vietnamese Restaurant, 26310 Fraser Hwy #230, Aldergrove, BC V4W 2Z7, Canada

hasMenuItem.description: Vietnamese pho with choice of beef or chicken balls, served with a soft drink.

hasMenuItem.name: Vietnamese Ice Coffee With Condensed Milk/Cà Phê Sữa Nóng
hasMenuItem.description: Vietnamese coffee prepared with a traditional drip method, featuring robust dark roast coffee and sweetened condensed milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Soda Lemonade/Soda Chanh Đường
hasMenuItem.description: Freshly squeezed lemon juice mixed with sugar and club soda, creating a refreshing Vietnamese soda lemonade.

hasMenuItem.name: Preserved Lemon with Soda/Soda Chanh Muối
hasMenuItem.description: Soda Chanh Muối combines preserved lemon with soda water, typically including a balance of salty and sweet flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Coconut Juice/Nước dừa
hasMenuItem.description: Coconut juice, also known as nước dừa, is a refreshing drink made from the water of young coconuts, often accompanied by tender coconut meat.

hasMenuItem.name: Juice Box
hasMenuItem.description: A portable and convenient serving of juice, typically featuring a blend of fruits for a refreshing drink.

hasMenuItem.name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Without Condensed Milk/ Cà phê đen đá
hasMenuItem.description: Extra strong Vietnamese coffee, traditionally brewed and served over ice, typically without the sweetness of condensed milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Soft Drink/Nước ngọt
hasMenuItem.description: Selection of sodas including 7 Up, Coke varieties, Dr Pepper, Ginger Ale, Orange Crush, and Root Beer.

review.reviewBody: They are always my first choice when it comes to Phò. It is always delicious, and their salad rolls are a favorite in my family too.
Love this place the other pho shop around aldergrove are also good but this place makes it just right for me. Thank you to the chefs makes my noodles just right every time
My personal favourites being any sandwiches with peanut sauce on the side. As well as the house special or signature spicy. Can never go wrong ordering here!!!!

I always order the prawn salad rolls, asking for no ham, and every time they're exactly how I asked them to be and they're so delicious! I also order the chicken ball soup and the lemongrass chicken with spring roll, amazing every time!
The rare eyed round steak pho was delicious as always, and the chicken salad rolls are so fresh, chrispy skin and the peanut sauce was great!
